cols.title: Community Health
cols.summary: Mobile nurses, prenatal care, and clinics.

focusAreas.title: Community Health
focusAreas.blurb: Mobile health camps and women’s wellness programs with trusted local nurses.
focusAreas.stat: 9,500+ medical consultations provided in remote districts.

focusAreas.title: Women’s Leadership
focusAreas.blurb: Micro-grants and trainings for women-led cooperatives focused on livelihoods.

focusAreas.title: Education Access
focusAreas.blurb: Scholarships, safe classrooms, and mentorship for rural students to stay in school.
focusAreas.stat: 92% of SWAN scholars graduated secondary school last year.

gallery.alt: SWAN volunteer distributing care packs to children seated at a rural madrasa.
Parent receiving a SWAN backpack during school readiness drive.
Students standing with their new SWAN backpacks after a leadership session.

slides.title: Because a student’s dream should never be out of reach.
slides.copy: SWAN teams travel deep into rural Nepal to deliver scholarships, women-led cooperatives, and mobile health camps — all in partnership with the communities we serve.
slides.alt: Children in Nepal reading books together.
slides.highlight: Emergency scholarships and transport stipends help girls finish exam season.

slides.title: Mobile nurses trek to the hardest-to-reach wards.
slides.copy: Support health camps that bring prenatal care, screenings, and lifesaving medicine to villages hours from the nearest clinic.
slides.alt: SWAN health volunteer providing care to a family.
slides.highlight: Nurses hike for hours with prenatal kits, vaccines, and health counseling.

slides.title: Women-led cooperatives keep livelihoods local.
slides.copy: Back entrepreneurs launching seed banks and training hubs so profits stay with the women who lead them.
slides.alt: Women leaders smiling and working together.
slides.highlight: Seed funding and coaching turn co-ops into steady jobs for women.

items.title: Community owned
items.description: Programs are designed and audited with village committees so funding answers real priorities.

items.title: Data informed
items.description: We track attendance, graduation, and health outcomes to learn fast and adapt faster.

items.title: Lean operations
items.description: 90% of gifts go directly into programs thanks to a mostly volunteer leadership team.

projects.title: Health & women-led impact on the ground
projects.body: Three recent distributions that kept families healthy, daughters learning, and mothers leading change across Siraha.

items.title: Mobile health camp & medicine distribution
items.description: Local health workers joined SWAN to deliver primary care checkups, vitamins, and health counseling for children and elders.
items.alt: SWAN volunteer handing medicine and notebooks to children during a rural health camp.

items.title: Women-led supply drive for school return
items.description: Mothers received backpacks stocked with sanitary supplies so their daughters could attend school confidently through the monsoon.
items.alt: Mother receiving a SWAN backpack from the distribution team.

items.title: Girls’ mentorship circle and leadership pledge
items.description: Community mentors rallied girls to stay in school, handing out study kits and outlining scholarships backed by SWAN donors.
items.alt: Group of girls standing with SWAN backpacks after a leadership session.

cta.title: Join the SWAN collective
cta.body: Monthly donors fund emergency scholarships and keep health camps on the road year-round.

campaigns.title: Ambulance & emergency transport
campaigns.summary: Keep SWAN’s field ambulance fueled and stocked so mobile teams can reach remote wards with lifesaving care.
campaigns.body: Your gift fuels ambulance transport, restocks emergency medicines, and funds drivers who respond to late-night calls in Nepal’s hardest-to-reach wards.
highlights: Fuel and maintenance for 200km+ weekly routes
24/7 driver and nurse standby for high-need cases

campaigns.title: Highest-need response fund
campaigns.summary: Let SWAN deploy your gift to the most urgent classrooms, clinics, or cooperatives without delay.
campaigns.body: When disasters strike or a partner signals an urgent shortage, this flexible fund keeps nurses, teachers, and women leaders moving within hours.
highlights: Rapid response within 12 hours of an alert
Covers gaps when designated funds run low

campaigns.title: Give Zakat
campaigns.summary: Fulfill your Zakat obligation by backing scholars, widows, and medical aid across Nepal and beyond.
campaigns.body: Zakat funds prioritize families with little to no income, channeling support into food, education stipends, and health care.
highlights: Verified cases reviewed with local imams
Option to dedicate to a loved one

campaigns.title: Zakat al-Fitr
campaigns.summary: Ensure families receive staple food before Eid by sending Zakat al-Fitr through SWAN.
campaigns.body: Your gift is converted to food parcels before the Eid prayer so everyone can celebrate with dignity.
highlights: Rice, lentils, oil, and dates in each parcel
Works for families in Nepal and the diaspora

campaigns.title: Sponsor an orphan
campaigns.summary: Monthly sponsorships cover school fees, meals, and counseling for orphaned students.
campaigns.body: We coordinate with guardians to cover essentials, mentorship, and emergency needs so every child stays in school.
highlights: Monthly reports on the student you sponsor

methods.title: Domestic transfer (Nepal)
methods.summary: Send NPR directly to SWAN’s account for zero processing fees. Share your receipt and we’ll confirm within one business day.

methods.title: Employer & corporate matches
methods.summary: We partner with CSR teams to match donations, run giving days, or sponsor women-led co-ops.
details: Field visits and volunteer days available

methods.title: Checks & offline giving
methods.summary: Mail checks or drop donations at our Kathmandu or Pokhara offices. We’ll issue digital receipts.

contact.title: Talk to our giving desk
contact.body: Need banking instructions, tax docs, or want to dedicate a gift? Our stewardship team will respond within one business day.

events.title: Palestine Tour 2025 / With Love Tour
events.summary: Join solidarity evenings supporting Gaza, Syria, and Sudan with SWAN storytellers and partners.

events.title: Our People, Our Pakistan
events.summary: Hear updates from community brigades rebuilding schools after floods and learn how to help.

events.title: Corporate matching webinar
events.summary: CSR teams learn how to activate matches and employee engagement for SWAN programs.

matchingGifts.title: Multiply your impact with matching gifts
matchingGifts.body: Register your donation with your employer’s matching platform and we’ll confirm the impact within one business day.

moreWays.title: Corporate matches
moreWays.summary: Work with our partnerships team to match employee donations or sponsor a program.

moreWays.title: Adventure challenges
moreWays.summary: Host a trek, marathon, or local challenge to rally donations for urgent appeals.

moreWays.title: Vehicle donations
moreWays.summary: Donate a vehicle to fund mobile clinics and health caravans.

moreWays.title: Legacy & wills
moreWays.summary: Include SWAN in your will or trust; we’ll share sample language.

moreWays.title: Grants & foundations
moreWays.summary: Partner with SWAN through foundation grants or CSR giving.

press.title: IRUSA in the News
press.summary: Roundup of coverage featuring SWAN field partners and diaspora leaders.

press.title: Press release — Mobile nurses deploy
press.summary: Details on the latest health caravans and how donors can help.

podcasts.title: What a Relief! with SWAN volunteers
podcasts.summary: Hear from nurses trekking to remote wards and the donors who keep them moving.

podcasts.title: Diaspora fundraising playbook
podcasts.summary: Strategies for mobilizing diaspora networks for urgent appeals.

reports.title: 2024 Impact report
reports.summary: Program metrics, financials, and stories from each district.

regionsOverview.title: Madhesh Province
regionsOverview.body: Mobile nurses, scholarships, and women-led cooperatives anchor our work across Siraha and bordering districts.

regionsOverview.title: Gandaki & Lamjung
regionsOverview.body: Earthquake recovery, youth leadership camps, and new libraries keep students on track.

regionsOverview.title: Diaspora hubs
regionsOverview.body: Fundraising teams in the US, Gulf, and Europe power emergency appeals and keep programs responsive.

advocacy.title: Advocacy & campaigns
advocacy.body: Raise your voice for equitable aid, education access, and policies that keep rural communities thriving.

actions.title: Contact your representative
actions.summary: Share SWAN briefs on rural education and women’s leadership.

actions.title: Host a listening session
actions.summary: Invite SWAN partners to virtual briefings with your community.

actions.title: Join our policy network
actions.summary: Receive alerts when key votes or regulations need grassroots input.

stockDonations.title: Give stock & appreciated assets
stockDonations.body: Avoid capital gains and maximize impact by donating stocks, crypto, or securities directly to SWAN.
instructions: Account name: SWAN Nepal Relief Fund
Notify give@swan.org with the asset name and quantity
benefits: Receive a charitable deduction for the fair market value
Avoid capital gains tax on appreciated assets
Keep programs funded year-round with a single transfer

zakat.title: Fulfill your Zakat with SWAN
zakat.body: Support scholars, widows, and families across Nepal and the diaspora with transparent distribution.

fitr.title: Zakat al-Fitr
fitr.body: Give before Eid prayer so every family has staple food. Suggested amount: $15 per person or equivalent in NPR.

offline: Bank transfer: NIC Asia • Account #02456789012345 • SWIFT: NICASNBAXXX
Reference “ZAKAT” in the memo and email slip to give@swan.org.
For cash or check drop-off, visit our Kathmandu or Pokhara offices.

orphans.title: Sponsor an orphaned student
orphans.body: Monthly sponsorships cover school fees, meals, and counseling with guardians across Nepal.
bullets: Emergency funds when families need urgent help

storiesPreview.title: Stories from the field
storiesPreview.body: See how communities are steering projects and changing what’s possible for the next generation.

partners.title: Trusted by local governments & global allies

footer.blurb: SWAN is a registered nonprofit advancing education, health, and youth leadership across rural Nepal.
